titles: Problemys of olde siknesse and figures Whiche p[ro]uyd been fructuous of sentens and haue auctorities grounded on scripture by resemblance of notable apperannce [sic] with moralities concludynge on prudence.
author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
notes: Title from opening words of text. Printer's name from colophon; date of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
